channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: King Gizzard & The Lizard Wizard Pull Catalog From Spotify
item.description: 🦎 King Gizzard & The Lizard Wizard making moves! Where will you be jamming to their tunes now? 🎶 #MusicNews #KingGizzard

item.title: Chris Martin’s Ex, Gwyneth Paltrow, Stars As New “Spokesperson” for Astronomer in Wake of Coldplay Kiss Cam Video
item.description: Chris Martin's ex, Gwyneth Paltrow, is giving us all the cosmic vibes as the new "spokesperson" for an astronomer! 🌟 #CelebAstronomyFun

item.title: HYBE Shares Slip Amidst Legal Problems as K-Pop Stocks Suffer a Losing Streak
item.description: Keep calm and stream on 🎶💸 Let's send positive vibes to our favorite K-Pop labels during this rollercoaster ride! 🎢 #KPopDrama

item.title: Oasis Honor “Rock ‘n’ Roll Star” Ozzy Osbourne at London Show: Watch
item.description: Oasis rocks London with a tribute to the legendary Ozzy Osbourne! 🎸🌟 Watch the magic unfold! #RockAndRollLegends

item.title: Drake – “Which One” (Feat. Central Cee)
item.description: 🔥 Drake drops new single "Which One" featuring Central Cee! 🎶 Let the vibes take over! #NewMusicAlert #Drake #CentralCee
